main event: A sighting of a golden yellow object that went straight up and then went out occurred on February 27, 1956 in Cedar Hill, Texas.
interesting points: The object was analyzed and concluded to be a balloon launched from a nearby airport.,The sighting lasted for approximately 3-4 minutes.,The object was seen through the windshield of an automobile and spectacles.,Witnesses included a department store stock manager and other individuals from Grand Prairie, Texas.,The analysis suggested insufficient data to support alternative explanations.
witness description: department store stock manager and other individuals
